i just recently switched my client to Vuze. i noticed that it doesn't show me which video type it is like it does with bittorrent client. i need Video TS to be able to burn movies onto DVDs. how can i tell if it is Video TS? thanks for the help!!

xMissAshleyx1389, this is the wrong place to ask help questions. This page is only read by people interested in this film. Click the Forum button below and register.
But: Yes, this IS the Video TS version. If you click '11' to the right of Files on top, you will se the contents with VOB, IFO and BUP files in a TS folder. You will see the same if you click 'Files' on the torrent in Vuze.
If you can burn a DVD with the Video TS folder, you can also burn other formats. Install Nero Burning Rom, or Google your problems like the rest of us.
I forgot to thank you, Hajime, for this funny film. The Calypso scene is really outstanding!
